title: The Adventures of Waddles: Learning about Bullies
description: What happens when Waddles witnesses bullies? In this lighthearted children's book, we follow these little penguins as they navigate the challenges of growing up. The first life lesson? Bullies. Read this with your kids of all ages to open up discussions about what to do if our friends make a mean comment. Learn more about Waddles and his new pal!
author: Dre Archibald
